Text: BookCloseoutscom Clearance SaleDear BookCloseoutscom Customer We are offering bigger savings than ever before BookCloseoutscom is making room for new product and has slashed prices on already deeply discounted books We invite you to visit our Clearing House to search over titles OFF the list price BookCloseoutscom Clearing House bcclearinghouseasp Sincerely Kathryn Retzik EMarketing Coordinator BookCloseoutscom This email is being sent one time only to all registered BookCloseoutscom customers If you wish not to receive promotional email from BookCloseoutscom in the future please reply to this message with remove typed in the subject line
